title: Client Replay System
body: Hello, I am wondering how do we change the replay system file type that it is put under when we are done recording. I was looking for it on the client itself under settings but I did not see it there. Anyone have any ideas?

replies.body: There isn't a way for you to change what file type those highlights are saving as. If you need a media player that recognizes that format, I'd suggest using VLC Media Player as it's been pretty fool proof for myself and others.
